data.title: Product Support - QoreStor
data.meta_description: Support information to install, trouble shoot and maintain your Quest product
data.text:
Below is a list of the recommended software along with any documentation that will help with the install process to bring your product to the version referenced.

QoreStor Server 7.4.0.222 Installer for Linux For a complete list of the supported hardware and OS releases for this plugin, see the QoreStor current version Interoperability Guide. Version: 7.4.0.222 File Format:Linux self-extractable installer File Name:qs_inst_7.4.0.222.bin How to generate a license for Qorestor? Please refer to the Support Portal knowledge base article 258360 for additional...

QoreStor Server 7.4.0 Virtual Machine for ESX 7.0-8.0 Tier-1 Local Storage : File: qorestor-tier1-hw17-novtl-7.4.0.222-OL9.4-001.ova

QoreStor Server 7.4.0.2220 Signature for Linux Update Package is used to authenticate Quest's identity in the correlated Linux Update Package. Version: 7.4.0.222 File Format:GnuPG Signature for Linux Update file File Name:qs_inst_7.4.0.222.sign

QoreStor 4.1.0.811 OST plugin for SUSE Enterprise Linux Supporting Veritas BackupExec and NetBackup Version: Version 4.1.0.811 File Format:GNU-Zip File Name:QuestOSTPlugin-4.1.0.811-x86_64-SLES.bin.gz Please refer to the Support Portal knowledge base article 4042943 for additional information and instructions on implementing the plugin.

QoreStor Server 7.4.0 Virtual Machine for ESX 7.0-8.0 Tier-2 Local Storage : File: qorestor-tier2-hw17-novtl-7.4.0.222-OL9.4-001.ova

QoreStor Server 7.4.0 Virtual Machine for ESX 7.0-8.0 Tier-1 Object Direct : File: qorestor-tier1-hw17-od-7.4.0.222-OL9.4-001.ova

QoreStor Server 7.4.0 Virtual Machine for ESX 7.0-8.0 Tier-3 Object Direct : File: qorestor-tier3-hw17-od-7.4.0.222-OL9.4-001.ova

QoreStor Server 7.4.0 Virtual Machine for ESX 7.0-8.0 Tier-3 Local Storage : File: qorestor-tier3-hw17-novtl-7.4.0.222-OL9.4-001.ova

QoreStor Server 7.4.0 Virtual Machine for ESX 7.0-8.0 Tier-2 Object Direct (English) : File: qorestor-tier2-hw17-od-7.4.0.222-OL9.4-001.ova

QoreStor 4.0.3320.1 Rapid NFS plugin for SUSE Enterprise Linux (64-bit) ( with Secure Connect support ) Version: 4.0.3320.1 File Format:GNU-Zip File Name: QuestRapidNFS-4.0.3320.1-x86_64-SLES.bin.gz Download Type:HTTP Format Description: Please refer to the User Guide for additional information and instructions on implementing the plugin.

The information below represents the most common issues customers are encountering or recent resolutions to help you trouble shoot your Quest Product.

How to generate a license key for Qorestor? Once Qorestor is installed, what do I do to add a permanent license key?

When adding QoreStor to the NetVault Server, error message Failed to open a session with the device 'Broken pipe' is logged. Additional information indicates RDA Library error code: 26. Error message could also be displayed when running a backup job.

QoreStor container goes offline when backup job runs; other containers remains online. Job changes to waiting status due to no suitable device. In other cases, issue is reported when retiring expired savesets. NetVault logs include messages similar to the following: No suitable device for job X (instance X) - request held in queue Failed to remove items from device 'Quest Qorestor (DefaultGrou...
